Section.Catchline: Civil action to enforce prepaid health clinic contract; attorney’s fees; court costs.

SectionBody.Text: In any civil action brought to enforce the terms and conditions of a prepaid health clinic contract, the prevailing party is entitled to recover reasonable attorney’s fees and court costs. This section shall not be construed to authorize a civil action against the commission or office, or their employees, or against the Agency for Health Care Administration, the employees of the Agency for Health Care Administration, or the Secretary of Health Care Administration.
